about_the_game:
Deck Building Roguelike with a twist!


A silly little Deckbuilding card battler! Attack enemies, Gain Block, Get Cards/Relics, Remove Cards, and kill enemies! However, you can use your cards on more then yourself and enemies:

Use Cards on Status effects!
Damage your Bleed to remove it or at least soften the blow! Heal your own Might to deal even more damage! Heal enemy Bleed to make them die faster!



Use Cards on Enemy intentions!
Destroy enemies attacks, Offense is the best Defense!



Use Cards on Relics!
A relic that lets you use 1 card on all enemies? Great for a deck around building up one super strike! A relic that lets you save a card for next turn? Could help with all sorts of combos. Find all sorts of "Active" relics!



But most importantly...

Combine Card Orbs via Keywords!


Use Cards on Cards! Cards will have all sorts of keywords that change how they work.

Potent cards will double all Healing and status effects on a card! Useful for stacking all sorts of effects!
Cheap cards will cost 2 less then they would otherwise!
Unstable cards double all their effects, but can only be used once.

These effects are great on their own, but even more powerful when put on another card! Plan your deck around powerful combinations.

Original Card

After some Combining!

Stages and Progression

Progress through the many stages with multiple characters to see and use.
Each stage will contain it's own story beat and challenges.

Real Talk

This game is made by 1 solo developer who just really likes card games who truely hopes you have a bit of fun playing this silly little game!

short_description: A short experimental deck building roguelike! Use Attack Cards on enemy intentions to weaken their attacks, Use Heal Cards on status effects to increase their effects! Play as a Demon bounty hunter looking for their Target in purgatory as you combine and use Card orbs.
